text: Describing the significance of worshipping Navgraha (nine planets), Lord Vishnu told Rudra --' One who worships the Navgraha with appropriate rituals attains all the four 'purusharth'(objectives of man's life)-dharma(religion), artha(money), kaam(sex) and moksha(salvation).
' He then went on to give various mantras related with the Navgrahas, which a devotee should chant while worshipping them -- SURYA(SUN) -- OM SURYA MURTAYE NAMAH.
OM HRAM HRIM SAH SURYAY NAMAH.
title: Navgrah Mantra
